p: Bacterial strains of Staphylococcus aureus (ATCC 25923/Lot 902840), Escherichia coli (ATCC 25922/Lot 931370) and Pseudomonas aeruginosa (ATCC 27853/Lot 931372) were used in this research. The microorganisms were supplied from BR-Ambient and Food Laboratory Lda., of the American Type Culture Collection (ATCC), distributed by Culti-loops ® (OXOID Ltd, Basingstoke, UK.) Organisms were maintained on Mueller-Hinton agar (MH2-Ref. 43301; BioMérieux SA, Lyon, France). The microbial suspensions turbidity was made based on 0.5 McFarland (~10 8 CFU/mL) [ 50].
